name: Yoshito
text:
Master... no, my God, my Lord, [Player]!
Please, allow this Yoshito to handle all of your dirty work.

name: Yoshito
text:
And let's revolutionize this Tokyo and build our―
A paradise of dreams someday!!

Ever since he officially made a transfer contract,
he has been, well, pretty much like this.

One of the Eight Dog Warriors, Inukawa Sosuke Yoshito.
In this Tokyo, he is a renowned puppeteer.

His most remarkable trait is the
'Righteousness' shown by the jewel he possesses.

He can trace the actions of another person.
That is why he is always a righteous warrior in someone else's eye.

And there's nothing he fears more than his
precious person to die from dirty tactics.

Therefore, the sole purpose of all his actions,
is to maintain the existence of his object of faith.

name: Yoshito
text:
Master, no, my God! How is your health?
Are there any unsettling elements around you?

options.text: You're energetic today, Yoshito...
No, no, there's nothing like that!
The 'World Representative' showed up by my pillow again.

name: Yoshito
text:
I, in the shadows, will personally exterminate anything
that invades the living space of Master, no, my God!

name: Yoshito
text:
Please, do not stain your hands.
Leave everything to me, won't you?

options.text: No, it's really okay.
What are you talking about???
I've made a dangerous contract...!

name: Yoshito
text:
Should I stop calling you God in front of the academy?
Understood. I'll refrain from doing so as much as possible, Master!!

—And then, it was Christmas.
The season when the town is filled with colorful decorations and songs.

Walking casually through the streets of Tokyo,
Yoshito noticed a stylish sweets shop.

name: Yoshito
text:
Should I buy those sweets for Master?
Maybe a tea set would be good, too...

As Yoshito was about to take the sweets to the cashier,
he received a call from his Master.

name: Yoshito
text:
Eh, to the amusement park, with me?
Yes, if Master so wishes, I'd love to...!

name: Yoshito
text:
Right now...?
I was just thinking of you.

name: Yoshito
text:
I found some nice sweets to give you as a souvenir,
Master, so let's eat them together next time we meet.

name: Yoshito
text:
Yes... then,
I'll be looking forward to next week.

After hanging up, Yoshito's heart fluttered
with excitement about the upcoming date.

name: Yoshito
text:
............Hehe.
Hehehehehehehehe.

That's when Yoshito realized,
that he was feeling happy.

name: Yoshito
text:
Am I... smiling?
And so naturally at that?

name: Yoshito
text:
Lately, I've been so strange.
It's like my guard is down or something...

name: Yoshito
text:
I can't perform my duties like this!
I won't be a perfectly controllable puppet this way!

name: Yoshito
text:
This is bad, if I keep on going like this...
I don't even deserve to be this happy.

What came to Yoshito's mind was
his beloved, his righteous adoptive brother.

name: Yoshito
text:
I have sworn,
that I would never betray you again...

And then, on the day before
the promised date, Yoshito contacted [Player].

name: Yoshito
text:
I'm sorry, Master.
It seems that I cannot go to our date tomorrow.

options.text: Are you busy?
Did you receive a mission?
Eh, Yoshito!?

name: Yoshito
text:
...Yes, I have a mission that I cannot afford to avoid.
I sincerely apologize, Master.

name: Yoshito
text:
Well then...
I must be going, Master.

Before they could talk about rescheduling,
Yoshito abruptly ended the call.

options.text: Something's not right... Definitely not right...
You would have prioritized our date...
You would be behind me right now, even without me calling you...

name: Yoshito
text:
....
This is for the best, it has to be for the best...

He collapsed onto the table in his room.
In his line of sight were two handmade dolls.

His heart, which never felt pain no matter
how cruel his missions were, was now throbbing.

Tears threatened to spill and his nose stung, but he
suppressed his emotions and acted as if nothing had happened.

name: Yoshito
text:
I thought I had abandoned my heart and become
a puppet, in both body and soul...

Looking at the dolls of his Master and himself
side by side, emotions welled up inside him once more.

name: Yoshito
text:
The past few days have been strange. I've been so happy...
If this continues, I'll become useless.

Yoshito picked up the Master's doll and his own,
and with a single 'good night'—

He dove into his bed,
and hugged the dolls tightly.

The doorbell woke Yoshito up.
He wasn't supposed to have any missions today.

Suspiciously, Yoshito picked up his
katana and checked the peephole.

name: Yoshito
text:
Ah, Master...!?
Why are you here!?

options.text: You seemed a bit off.
I was worried you got sick.
I came here because I was worried.

name: Yoshito
text:
Master... no, my God!
For you to come all this way for someone like me...

A silence fell between them,
separated only by the door.

options.text: Hey, aren't you going to open the door...?
Let me in~
Did I bother you by coming so suddenly?

name: Yoshito
text:
Ah, s-sorry! I understand!
Could you wait for just a moment?

With that, Yoshito went back into his room,
and returned just a few seconds later.

name: Yoshito
text:
Please, come in, Master.
My room is empty and boring, but still...

With hardly anything in it, Yoshito's room was clean,
and didn't look like much of a place to live in.

options.text: You keep your room so clean, that's impressive.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Thank you!
But this is a room where I just come home from my missions and sleep, so it's impossible for it to get dirty.

options.text: Could you help me clean my room sometime?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course, if you ask me to, I'll be there whenever you need me.
Feel free to use me for any kind of chore.

options.text: Wow, this is like a minimalist's room!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: My place of residence changes depending on my mission, and I just come here to sleep...

text: That's when [Player] noticed another door.

options.text: What about that room?
You hid something, didn't you...?
(Gives him a suspicious look)

name: Yoshito
text:
Ah... You see, Master.
In this world, there exists doors to the abyss that should never be opened.

name: Yoshito
text:
But if you insist...
Then I suppose there's no other choice.

Yoshito opened the door just enough for him to go through,
and then he disappeared into the room.

name: Yoshito
text:
Please understand, Master.
Don't look inside until I come out, alright?

options.text: O-Okay...
What on earth is in there...?
This is really close to a fairy tale...

text:
After rummaging around for a while,
Yoshito returned with an album.

name: Yoshito
text:
Hehe, I'll show you my secret album,
especially for you, Master.

The album contained pictures of a Moritaka
doll posing in various famous spots in Tokyo.

name: Yoshito
text:
There are some pictures taken at Snowland, too.
Look, doesn't it look good in the magical girl outfit?

Yoshito was talking so happily,
but that only made the suspicion grow—

options.text: Hey Yoshito— What was the mission?
Why did you turn down my invitation to the amusement park?
I saw right through you, now confess!

name: Yoshito
text: ...T-that's...!

Yoshito realized that he had a sorrowful look on his face in front of [Player],
and he felt a great deal of remorse.

name: Yoshito
text:
I'm sorry, Master... I didn't mean to make that face.
I just thought someone like me was not fit to be by your side.

name: Yoshito
text:
I am a shadow, your shadow.
And yet, I keep imagining myself standing by your side.

name: Yoshito
text:
And I'm very happy... to the point that I could break.
I feel like I'm going insane!

name: Yoshito
text:
I told you to treat me as a tool, and yet...
I'll be unable to return if I continue like this.

name: Yoshito
text:
There's nothing more troublesome or difficult to handle than
a tool with a mind of its own. Before I become that— Ah!

options.text: Calm down, calm down.
I still don't understand anything!
I'm relieved that you're the usual Yoshito I know.
I want to go with you, Yoshito.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Thank you, Master.
I also... adore you very much.

options.text: Let's go to the amusement park together.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...Yes, I really want to go to the amusement park with you!

options.text: Should I order you to come?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...How much easier it would have been if you had.
But, that's probably not what you would've wanted.

name: Yoshito
text:
So let me say it again.
Master, please, go to the amusement park with me!

name: Yoshito
text:
...Ah, it's finally happening.
But there's a part of me that can't contain my joy.

name: Yoshito
text:
This happiness... this happiness is scary.
I... I might go insane!

options.text: You're thinking strange things again, aren't you?
Sorry to keep you waiting, Yoshito.
Let's have fun today~!

name: Yoshito
text:
You're here, Master!
I'm sorry, I'm still a little uneasy...

name: Yoshito
text:
No, I am happy, but it feels like...
That this is all just a dream.

The feeling of guilt, a kind of compulsion that he wasn't supposed
to feel happy so easily, was not something that could be easily erased.

options.text: We'll get used to it little by little.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Yes, thank you.
I will work even harder to be loyal to you!

options.text: (Pats Yoshito on the head)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahhh... please stop that.
I'm going to act like an undignified dog and get all excited.

options.text: I'll make you even happier.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Yes, thank you.
I will work even harder to be loyal to you!

text:
Yoshito and [Player] decided to go on
some light attractions first.

Whether it was intentional or not, Yoshito didn't
have the Moritaka doll he usually carried with him.

options.text: By the way, do you have a doll of me?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: I-I would never do such a presumptuous thing, to even make a doll of you, Master...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Are you sure?
Are you sure you'll allow me to make a doll of you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Who knows what it'll be used for...
It might be hugged and slept with, for example...
Saying that, Yoshito took out a doll of [Player] from a bag he was holding.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: Ah... no, this is just...

options.text: Can you make a doll of me for me?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: I-I would never do such a presumptuous thing, to even make a doll of you, Master...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Are you sure?
Are you sure you'll allow me to make a doll of you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Who knows what it'll be used for...
It might be hugged and slept with, for example...
Saying that, Yoshito took out a doll of [Player] from a bag he was holding.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: Ah... no, this is just...

options.text: You don't have a doll of me, do you?

name: Yoshito
text: I-I would never do such a presumptuous thing, to even make a doll of you, Master...

Yoshito looked away from the bag in his hand.
It was obvious what that meant.

note: [This option will only be available if Option 3 is selected]

options.text: That bag...

dialogue_after_selection.text: Like he had given up, Yoshito took out the doll of [Player] from the bag.

options.text: Yoshito, you don't mean to tell me—

dialogue_after_selection.text: Like he had given up, Yoshito took out the doll of [Player] from the bag.

options.text: Show me what's in there, won't you?

dialogue_after_selection.text: Like he had given up, Yoshito took out the doll of [Player] from the bag.

name: Yoshito
text:
I'm s-sorry.
I just couldn't help myself...

options.text: The quality is amazing!
Aren't you a bit over-beautifying me...?
Do I really look like this to you?

name: Yoshito
text:
...Thank you. I put a lot of effort into it,
recreating all the things I love about you, Master.

name: Yoshito
text:
You really don't mind,
that I'm enjoying a hobby with a doll of you?

options.text: I'm happy, because it means that you like me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm glad you feel that way.
I actually have a present for you.

options.text: I was actually jealous because Moritaka was around all the time.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I would never do anything to make Master jealous...!
But I'm happy that you feel that way about me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: I didn't have the confidence to show you, but Master, I actually have a present for you.

options.text: Don't show it to people, it's really embarrassing.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course.
Only I should know about you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: I didn't have the confidence to show you, but Master, I actually have a present for you.

text:
Yoshito took out a doll
of himself from the bag.

name: Yoshito
text:
This... If you don't want it,
please feel free to burn it.

options.text: Thank you, I love it.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: I'm happy that you're so pleased, I didn't think you'd like it this much.

options.text: I'll sleep with it.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes, I'll sleep with yours too.
Hehe, we'll be together even while we're sleeping.

options.text: Maybe I should start collecting dolls, too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's a great idea.
We can exchange pictures, or go on trips together with our dolls...

name: Yoshito
text:
Master, why don't we take
a picture with our dolls?

options.text: Okay, I'll go get a camera.
That's a great idea!
We'll look like a super lovey-dovey couple.

text:
The two of them stood in front of the merry-go-round and had their picture taken.
Seeing the picture, Yoshito smiled softly.

name: Yoshito
text:
Thank you, Master.
This is a lifelong treasure from Master to this Yoshito!

After that, the two of them
moved to a shop nearby.

name: Yoshito
text:
Master, why are we at a shop...?
Are you buying a souvenir for a school friend?

options.text: I'm thinking of getting a present for you, Yoshito!
It's in return for the doll.
Is there anything you want?

name: Yoshito
text:
No, there's no need to give me a present.
Your kind thought is already enough for me.

name: Yoshito
text:
After all, I'm a bad child who
never received a present from Santa...

options.text: Stop being negative~
If you don't have a preference, I'll just pick one myself.
I want to give a present to the person I love!

text:
Yoshito was still timid about
having someone pick a present for him.

As they walked around the shop,
[Player] found something nice.

options.text: (Pick a hairband)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
This... for me? You think it suits me...?
Please stop, don't call me cute.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Thank you.
I'm very happy to receive a gift from you, Master.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: I'll treasure this hairband and wear it every day.

options.text: (Pick matching accessories)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm so happy... Thank you.
I'm very happy to receive a gift chosen by you, Master.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'll have to build a dedicated altar for it at home!
I'll pray to it three times a day, without fail!

options.text: (Pick something memorable)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm so happy... Thank you.
I'm very happy to receive a gift chosen by you, Master.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'll have to build a dedicated altar for it at home!
I'll pray to it three times a day, without fail!

text:
As they left the shop,
[Player] handed the gift to Yoshito.

Yoshito looked at the carefully
ribbon-wrapped gift as if it were a treasure to him.

name: Yoshito
text:
Thank you so much, Master.
I'm so happy to have received a present that I'm at a loss for words.

name: Yoshito
text:
Um, just one more thing.
Will you grant my request?

Yoshito had never said what he wanted before.
A change was definitely happening within him.

name: Yoshito
text:
Next time, I will be the one to ask you out.
Will you go out with me again?

name: Yoshito
text:
It can be as Master and servant,
but if you allow it, I hope it can be like today—

options.text: Of course, I'd love to!
It'd be my pleasure!
Let's go on another date.

name: Yoshito
text:
Master, if you have any commands for me, please don't hesitate.
I will gladly do anything for you, Master.

name: Yoshito
text:
This applies not only to Master-servant commands,
but also... other requests.

options.text: Let's hold hands on the way home.

dialogue_after_selection.text: To a request that he would have refused in a second before, Yoshito now hesitantly held out his hand, looking embarrassed.

options.text: (Ask Yoshito to close his eyes)

dialogue_after_selection.text: Yoshito closed his eyes as he was told, and a few seconds later, a soft sensation landed on him.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, Master...!?
Are you in your right mind right now!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, if you're okay with it, I'll offer anything...
But still.

options.text: (Ask Yoshito to kiss you)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, Master...!?
Are you serious!?
Seeing [Player] nod, Yoshito steeled his resolve.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
E-Excuse me...!
If you feel like I'm being disrespectful, you can slice me down.
With a hand hesitantly placed on [Player]'s cheek, Yoshito moved closer.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
After all, I'm a samurai too.
I can get it done when I have to.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: If you keep saying things like that to me, this worthless puppet of yours might not be able to wait anymore.

name: Yoshito
text:
...Master, even with all my flaws, I truly,
from the bottom of my heart, believe in you.

name: Yoshito
text:
With you, even someone like me
might be able to reach a paradise of dreams.

name: Yoshito
text:
I, Yoshito is not someone who will blindly serve just anyone...
Though I understand why you'd find it hard to believe.

name: Yoshito
text:
Master... Will you come to my home again?
I still have those sweets we talked about the other day.

name: Yoshito
text:
I also have many things I want to talk about,
the past and the future.

name: Yoshito
text:
...That's right, Master, no, my God!
The construction plan for the [Player] & Moritaka Land!!

Saying that, Yoshito stood behind [Player]...
Then reconsidered and stood beside them.

Bathed in the songs of the Holy Night,
Inukawa Sosuke Yoshito... smiled like a child.
